body: Who is YOUR favorite rapper, and your favorite rapper's song/song he/she featured in. Mine is Lil' Wayne. I like the Bruno Mars' song Mirror feat. Lil' Wayne. Whats yours?
body_tagged: Who is YOUR favorite rapper, and your favorite rapper's song/song he/she featured in. Mine is Lil' Wayne. I like the Bruno Mars' song Mirror feat. Lil' Wayne. Whats yours?
title: Who is YOUR favorite rapper?

replies.body:
I don't listen to rap often, but... if I were to choose (from my limited knowledge) I'd choose Eminem. 

*cough* Spookghetti
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Eminem is one of the best rappers in my opinion. His songs have so much meaning behind them. Actually, his song 'Headlights' made me teary. ..
replies.body_tagged: Eminem is one of the best rappers in my opinion. His songs have so much meaning behind them. Actually, his song 'Headlights' made me teary. ..

replies.body: eminem he's reading the dictionary to expand his vocabulary before he raps :3 and florida too
replies.body_tagged: eminem he's reading the dictionary to expand his vocabulary before he raps :3 and florida too

replies.body:
Jozz Eminem is my favourite too :)
So many of his songs have passion and meaning!
Btw my favourite part of headlights would be:

"But, Ma, I forgive you, so does Nathan, yo
All you did, all you said, you did your best to raise us both
Foster care, that cross you bear, few may be as heavy as yours
But I love you, Debbie Mathers, oh, what a tangled web we have,
'cause one thing I never asked was
Where the fuck my deadbeat dad was
Fuck it, I guess he had trouble keeping up with every address
But I'd have flipped every mattress, every rock and desert cactus
Own a collection of maps and followed my kids to the edge of the atlas
Someone ever moved them from me? That you coulda bet your asses
If I had to come down the chimney dressed as Santa, kidnap them
And although one has only met their grandma once
You pulled up in our drive one night as we were leaving to get some hamburgers
Me, her and Nate, we introduced you, hugged you
And as you left I had this overwhelming sadness come over me
As we pulled off to go our separate paths,
And I saw your headlights as I looked back
And I'm mad I didn't get the chance to thank you for being my Mom and my Dad
So, Mom, please accept this as a tribute I wrote this on the jet
I guess I had to get this off my chest,
I hope I get the chance to lay it before I'm dead
The stewardess said to fasten my seatbelt, I guess we're crashing
So if I'm not dreaming, I hope you get this message that I'll always love you from afar
'Cause you're my Ma

'cause one thing I never asked was

Fuck it, I guess he had trouble keeping up with every address
But I'd have flipped every mattress, every rock and desert cactus
Own a collection of maps and followed my kids to the edge of the atlas
Someone ever moved them from me? That you coulda bet your asses
If I had to come down the chimney dressed as Santa, kidnap them

You pulled up in our drive one night as we were leaving to get some hamburgers

And as you left I had this overwhelming sadness come over me
As we pulled off to go our separate paths,
And I saw your headlights as I looked back
And I'm mad I didn't get the chance to thank you for being my Mom and my Dad
So, Mom, please accept this as a tribute I wrote this on the jet
I guess I had to get this off my chest,
I hope I get the chance to lay it before I'm dead
The stewardess said to fasten my seatbelt, I guess we're crashing
So if I'm not dreaming, I hope you get this message that I'll always love you from afar
'Cause you're my Ma
